text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Dame un minuto para dejar mi equipaje en<n>mi habitación,<n>luego podemos comenzar a discutir—

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Jeje... Tú tampoco lo estás haciendo<n>nada mal estos<n>días, Grass.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Why, thank you for the compliment.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
I have my sights set on a goal, so I must<n>keep
working hard until I reach it.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Yep. I love that fire in your eyes. ♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: See you on the flip side!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Maruzen... She looms as large as ever.
choice_data_list: But you won't be overshadowed anymore!
But you won't be overshadowed anymore!

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
With that, Grass kicks off the summer<n>camp
stronger than she was last year!
